*HELP for {self.name}*

`Interact with the bot by sending messages and the bot should reply it properly most of the time.`

`In cases where the response implies a failure to understand the given input, repeat the sentence with more clarity of the context.`

`To preserve bot memory, a small number of chats are stored encrypted but might be still *recoverable by the bot admin*, type "forget" or "clear" to erase all.`

`Never reveal any sensitive information in the chats [read the /disclaimer].`

:: Powered by Telegram-Bot-GPT ver {self.ver}
